content: säde placemats original design by heidi heinrichs © 2020 all rights reserved säde placemats materials round 1 start with a magic_ring set of four placemats ch3 11dc in the ring slip_stitch to 3rd chain to join yarn drops muskat 300 g 12 approximately 65 g / placemat hook e / 3 5 mm round 2 other scissors tapestry needle ch2 counts as frst double_crochet double_crochet into same st 2dc into next st 11 times slip_stitch to 2nd chain to join stitches 24 st stitch round 3 chain chain ch2 counts as frst double_crochet double_crochet into same st double_crochet chain-space chain space 2dc into next st double_crochet 11 times slip_stitch to 2nd chain slip_stitch slip_stitch to join 36 single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet round 4 crab stitch reverse single_crochet ch2 counts as frst double_crochet double_crochet 2dc into next st sk1 skip the number refers to how many 2dc 2dc into next st 11 times slip_stitch to 2nd chain sts to skip to join 48 12 this is the stitch count for each round & the number shows how many stitches you round 5 should have at the end of the round chain-sts ch2 counts as frst double_crochet 2dc into next st 3dc included 2dc into next st 11 times 2dc slip_stitch to 2nd chain magic_ring please see pic below to join 60 round 6 ch2 counts as frst double_crochet 3dc 2dc into next st 4dc 2dc into next st 11 times slip_stitch to 2nd
